overview: Gadi Peleg is an experienced high-tech professional, with more than 12 years experience in the telecommunications, semiconductor and information technology arenas. Prior to joining Zoomix, Gadi was Director of Customer Support and Product Deployment for PFS-TraderTools, where he worked with international banks and other large enterprises. He spent eight years with Nova Measuring Instruments (NASDAQ: NVMI), as customer account manager for multi-million dollar customer implementations in the U.S. Earlier, he worked for ECI Telecom. Gadi holds a B.Sc. in software engineering from Kennedy-Western University in the U.S.
